title: WANTED: THE THIEVES' DOMAIN
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:ui]]
[[module css]]

.poster_base {
    width: 100%;
    min-height: 800px;
    border: 2px solid black;
    background: white;
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/unusual-incidents-unit-hub/UIU_Logo-NSMBW.png);
    background-position: 1.5em 1.5em;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: 5em;
    background-attachment: local;
}

.poster_Header {
    font-size: 2em;
    margin-left: 4em;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.poster_Header > p {
    margin-top: 0.8em;
}
.poster_WantedText {
    font-size: 6em;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 900;
    margin-bottom: 0.2em;
}

.poster_WantedText > p {
    margin-top: 0em;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    line-height: 1;
}

.poster_Image {
    width: 50%;
    height: 400px;
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/unusual-incidents-unit-hub/UIU_Logo-NSMBW.png);
    background-size: cover;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center;
    border: 2px solid black;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
}

.poster_Text {
    border: 1px solid black;
    width: 70%;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    margin-top: 1.5em;
    margin-bottom: 1.5em;
    font-family: sans-serif;
}

.poster_Text > p {
    margin: 1em;
}

[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

"Hey, Harrington."

"Morning, Smith. Got the new wanted posters?"

"Yep. I was just gonna go put them up outside."

"Sounds good. By the way, did you see the Foundation is assigning some detectives to help us out?"

"What?"

"Yeah, they're apparently part of a special task force. Something something 'Interpol.'"

"Mmm. Do you happen to know who they are?"

"Yeah, they sent over their IDs. They're right here."

"...Smith? You do realize that three out of four of these are fictional characters, right?"

"What?"

"Yeah. Poirot, Zenigata and Dupin. Fictional. Agatha Christie, Kodō Nomura and Edgar Allan Poe."

"You're fucking with me."

"I think the Foundation is fucking with us."

"Maybe they're code names?"

"In this line of work?"

"What's up with Poirot? Why's his face all fuzzy?"

"Probably some memetic bullshit. Stop looking at... huh."

"What?"

"It doesn't say Poirot. It says Hercules Popeau. Who the hell is that? I've never even heard of him."

"Maybe he's real?"

"None of them are real. They can't be. In fact, I'm sure I've seen this Quinn Roscoe on some webfiction thing."

"How did you get so knowledgeable on literature anyway?"

"We're UIU paperpushers, what do //you// do with all your downtime?"

"Play games on my phone."

"Whatever. I'll take 'em into the conference room, then."

"I definitely think the Foundation is fucking with us, Smith."

"Why is that?"

"They sent us wanted posters for Arsène Lupin, Irene Adler, Robin Hood, and a ninja who's been dead for almost five hundred years."

"Oh yeah? I wouldn't be so sure, Harrington. Those sheets we were looking at earlier? The detective ones?"

"What about them?"

"What the--"

"Yeah."

"When did this happen?"

"I dunno. At some point within the last ten minutes. I went into the other room to get coffee and when I came back, everybody was shouting and taking pictures."

"You're telling me the Thieves' Domain was //here?!//"

"I dunno, Harrington! But just to be on the safe side, maybe go check on the wanted posters. We might need to replace them."
